affymetrix.calvin.parsers
Class CHPMultiDataFileReader

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.calvin.parsers.CHPMultiDataFileReader

public class CHPMultiDataFileReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads a multi-data CHP data file. It is an interpreter class.

read

public void read(CHPMultiDataData data)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 InvalidVersionException,
                 InvalidFileTypeException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
Reads the file header of the generic file and reads all the DataPlaneHeader information.

Parameters:
data - A reference to a GenericData object that will receive information from the file.
Throws:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException - The file does not exist.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException - The file version does not match.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException - The file is not of the right type.
